metadata.synopsis: One of the survived members of the Gur Tribe (not Ulma), thanks the player for joining her in killing Astarion, who had become a powerful Vampire Lord.

1.speaker: Oliver Quarlic, Cassivora Dophir, Katelyn Lerskin, Godfrey Mordels
1.text: Finally, Baldur's Gate is free of those bloodsuckers. You made the right choice.

0.speaker: Oliver Quarlic, Cassivora Dophir, Katelyn Lerskin, Godfrey Mordels
0.text: The city will face new dangers soon, but at least there's one less threat stalking the night. Thank you.
